divs: Sighting Detailsi have seen 3 different UFO's all about 40 years ago but i remember them like yesterday fist one almost everyday occournce at lake serene north of lynnwood wa. best one i watched for 10 minutes or so on top on roof of gulf gas station it was tilted about 20 deg. there were about 5 people like about 3-4 ft. tall 2 white may6be boss's 3 blue's workers they were on the deck working on it i guess i was on my way for a date or something that was 40 years ago. it was still there when i left. the last one was across the street from the gulf gas station going abouve Mc alesters motor cycle shop i think that was the name of the place. just went over the cycle shop was wood's i was driveing at the time after work going to a friends place or something. about 2 years later . the lake serene one was a almost everyday ocrence you could see them i used to have a picture but its long gone now. it had fire comming out from the bottom center cant remember what color it was in all 3 times i was driveing all 3 times i parked & watched the first one lot's of people saw them most everyday at night or dusk second one on gulf gas station after work i worked for seattle school dist.1 as a custodian i was about 20 years old it was kind of strange why it was at 20 deg. angle on gulf roof & people on deck of ship there was no feeling of time i dont know how long i watched it i left because i felt like i had to go.
trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Lynnwood
There were no other sightings in Lynnwood on or around November 30th 1970
Summary: disk was ontop of roof of gulf gas station at 20 deg.angle hovering
